name: Death's Gambit (itch) (osh.studio)
description:
CURRENT HIGH SCORE: 77

Screenshot your score if you can beat it!

Death's Gambit

Made as a Submission to Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the Inevitable

Controls:

Use mouse to play.

Grid Based Survival Game

Play as a wizard dude trying to outrun Death. Take turns with the grim reaper to move around a maze-like grid, picking up spell cards to help you escape.

Dev Thoughts

Really enjoyed Ludum Dare 50, got the theme I wanted but and was aiming for the compo submission, unfortunately ran out of time so this will be in the jam. Learned how to make a turn based system, a grid system and a card and deck style system. Also enjoyed designing in isometric pixel art. Even after everything there was quite a few features I wasn't able to make and a few cards/abilities I wasn't able to finish, but I like this game so I might expand after the jam. Open to any and all suggestions, I will make a wishlist.

Special thanks to my boy Davy for the voice lines.

Wishlist

Features

  • Fog of War
  • Multi-level, as in ground floor, second floor etc.
  • Ability to create and destroy blocks

Cards

  • Trap Card, place a trap for the reaper
  • Stun Card, stun the reaper for a turn
  • Increase player range for x rounds
  • Invisiblity, reaper cant follow for x rounds
